title: Instructional Design Expert Identity Formation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: For corporate language education program developers/managers. Practical integration of digital tools in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more core competencies in instructional design (becoming, being, willing) and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners can create a portfolio that concretizes their professional identity as an instructional designer through future-oriented reflection.
Learners can analyze five or more professional dispositions required in corporate language education contexts and develop action plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
